item.title: Palma
item.description: Introduction Palma is the capital of Mallorca, one of the Balearic Islands in Spain. It is a beautiful city with a rich history and culture. The city is located on the coast of the Mediterranean Sea and has a mild climate year-round. Palma is home to many historical landmarks, including the Cathedral of Santa Maria, the Bellver Castle, and the Almudaina Palace. The city also has a vibrant arts and culture scene, with museums, theaters, and art galleries.
